reviewContent:
The box in which the product was packaged was not damaged, but when I opened the box and checked the product, the plastic container was already severely crushed.  This means that the seller intentionally sent me a product that was already damaged before it was sent.

So I will return this product to Daraz for a refund and I do not recommend buying products from this seller.
